sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T4.ENTRPS_NM ,T3.MNG_FEE_SJ ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0),'999,990.00')) AS USAGE_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS GAS_FEE ,'0' AS ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_TOTAL_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_YR_MT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM024',T1.CHRGE_KND) AS CHRGE_KND_NM ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_AMT ,T1.RCIV_SE ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM025',T1.RCIV_SE) AS RCIV_SE_NM ,TO_CHAR(T1.RCIV_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCIV_DT ,T1.NHT_ISUE_YN ,T1.NHT_OUTPUT_YN ,T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T1.ARRRG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_AMT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_TARIFF,'0.000')) AS ARRRG_TARIFF ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.ARRRG_PAY_DATES,'999,990')) AS ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,T1.RM ,T1.DEPT_CD ,T1.REG_USR ,T1.UPD_USR FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_SEQ=T2.MNG_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T3 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T3.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T3.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T4 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T4.ENTRPSCD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND T1.NTIC_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T1.NTIC_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T1.RCIV_SE = #sRcivSe#
AND T1.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
ORDER BY T1.MNG_MT,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE,T1.NTIC_DT ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'999,999,999,990')) AS DATA_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(VAT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(NTIC_AMT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_NTIC_AMT FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
AND ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND NTIC_DT >= TO_DATE(#sStartNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND NTIC_DT < TO_DATE(#sEndNticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND RCIV_SE = #sRcivSe#
AND CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F SET PAY_TMLMT = TO_DATE(#payTmlmt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,RM = #rm# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = sysdate WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq#
